entry.title: TEST TITLE
entry.content:
Originally I planned a review of my moratorium on tool choices to take place at the end of June. I wanted to elaborate on the reasoning for my choices and discuss possible alternatives to the presented tool selection.

But I have decided to cancel that post. Blogging about the tool selection will only reinforce my problem of investing more time in the tools than using the tools for actual work.

As a short conclusion, let me say that most of the tools stayed the same, but some were switched. When there is something worthwhile to say about them, I will blog it.
